Subject: Neo Beast Wars RPG - Death...to me!
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
X-Mailer: CompuServe 2000 32-bit sub 103
From: KSLawdogg@...

Koga Shuko/Unitron/Hades/Anubis:


Koga Shuko checked his scanners.  "Multiple Maximals leaving the Ark and the 
new Maxi battle cruiser.  Assemble, we attack!"

~BH, this is Koga Shuko.  Take your companion and skimmer to the Ark, and 
attack it.  My forces and I will arrive shortly, Koga Shuko out~

"Come, Unitron, Anubis, and Hades.  Weapons ready, we go to engage the Ark!"

"We do that everytime!  Can't we do something different!"

"Shut up!  Shut up, shut up!  Just do as I order!" Koga Shuko yelled, the 
four robots leaving the Newcomer craft, high tailing it for the Ark.
